tasks.coref.bionlp

Class BioNLPCorefXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.coref.bionlp.BioNLPCorefXMLWriter

  • public class BioNLPCorefXMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to convert BioNLP coreference dataset annotations to internal XML representation understood by XMLReader.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Detail

      • processSingleFile

        public static nu.xom.Element processSingleFile(java.lang.String id,
                                               java.lang.String txtFilename,
                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> annFilenames)
        Processes a single BioNLP document from the associated files and returns its XML representation.
        Parameters:
        id - the id for the document
        txtFilename - the text file of the document
        annFilenames - the annotation files (a1 and a2 files)
        Returns:
        the XML representation of the document

      • processDirectory

        public static void processDirectory(java.lang.String in,
                                    java.lang.String out)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Processes a directory of BioNLP annotation files and writes the corresponding text and BioNLP XML files to the output directory. The output directory should be a valid directory. BioNLP annotation directory is expected to have txt, a1, and a2 files.
        Parameters:
        in - the input directory
        out - the output directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with reading/writing files

      • init

        public static void init(java.util.Properties props)
                 throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Initializes CoreNLP and the sentence segmenter from properties.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to use for initialization
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the sentence segmenter class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the sentence segmenter cannot be accessed
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the sentence segmenter cannot be initializaed
